acceptShipment(uint256).details: Vessel owner accepts a proposal, triggering NFT escrow. IMPORTANT: The shipper must first call `approve()` on the CargoNFT contract, giving this Brokerage contract permission to transfer the NFT.

params._shipmentId: The ID of the shipment to accept.

cancelShipment(uint256).details: Cancels a shipment and returns the Cargo NFT if it was in escrow.

params._shipmentId: The ID of the shipment to cancel.

completeShipment(uint256).details: Completes a shipment and transfers the Cargo NFT to the vessel owner as proof of completion. This function could be expanded to also handle payment release.

params._shipmentId: The ID of the shipment to complete.

proposeShipment(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Shipper proposes to use a journey for their cargo NFT.

params._cargoTokenId: The token ID of the shipper's cargo NFT.
params._journeyId: The ID of the desired journey.
params._price: The price offered for the shipment.
